author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied up the code a bit more, removing some old logging messages.
Also made loading of tag libraries lazy so that the standard library does not force jar dependencies until tags get used. e.g. javax.sql.* is only needed if you use the new SQL tags.

author: jstrachan
msg: removed unnecessary debug messages and old Context class

author: jstrachan
msg: removed unnecessary file added by mistake

author: jstrachan
msg: Added the new SQL tags from the JSTL reference implementation and ported them to Jelly.
Also started porting the invocation protocol to be more like the new JSP 1.3 invocation protocol.
Fixed a bunch of bugs around the place too.
Also we've now finally got an Ant task for running Jelly scripts! Woo-hoo!

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the build file so that its no longer dependent on jars included in jexl
